title: by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

for Rural and Community Development and the Gaeltacht) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister rural community development gaeltacht) order 2025

title: by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 2. Darragh Gallagher, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Darragh Gallagher, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Rural and Community Development and the 
Gaeltacht, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Rural and 
Community Development and the Gaeltacht with effect from 24th February
text_norm: 2 darragh gallagher particular whose address deposited office department rural community development gaeltacht appointed special adviser minister rural community development gaeltacht effect 24th february

title: by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government,
text_raw:
2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

10 June, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th June, 2025.
